lead_paragraph: Yao joins the foot trouble club for big men; the N.B.A. and the N.H.L. prepare for their free agency frenzies; and baseball lurches toward its All-Star break.
snippet: Yao joins the foot trouble club for big men; the N.B.A. and the N.H.L. prepare for their free agency frenzies; and baseball lurches toward its All-Star break.
